tasks.task: Examine and identify common strawberry diseases in Alabama.
subtasks: Describe the appearance of common leaf spots (fungal and bacterial).
Explain methods to control fungal leaf spots and assess their resistance.
Identify and describe bacterial angular leaf spot, including weather conditions that favor its development.
Describe the symptoms and management strategies for anthracnose crown rot and phytoptera root and crown rot, noting the importance of resistant varieties and soil drainage.
Discuss the causes, symptoms, and control methods for gray mold (Botrytis) fruit rot, emphasizing fungicide application schedules and resistance considerations.
Explain management strategies for other fruit rots, including anthracnose fruit rot, neopestalosphaeria, and rhizopus, highlighting the role of cultural practices and fungicide resistance.
